channel.title: Two things
channel.description:
Why do people never get warned(I say ban them) for asking about moparscape on these forums? It is breaking forum rules eh?
You mods have a warn button, use it lulz.
And the other one is:
Is there an age limit here? Someone on the irc told me it was 13?

item.title: Two things

item.description:

The Un-Named:

[…]I’ll happily read through all your posts and link to you breaking rules.

You wouldn’t have to look too far.

Read full topic

item.title: Two things
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:51, topic:141190”][quote author=nohope link=topic=193430.msg1743855#msg1743855 date=1189375088]
Of course he changed his name

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]

Proof that it is actually The Un-Named?

I rescind that statement.

ich.bin.niall@gmail.com looks legit.[/quote]

That’s my email address, as well as niall@moparisthebest.com, niallcoates@msn.com and my non-working(for reference), niallcoates@tiscali.co.uk.

[quote=“nohope, post:45, topic:141190”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=193430.msg1741096#msg1741096 date=1189292259]

[quote author=nohope link=topic=193430.msg1741081#msg1741081 date=1189292088]If gmods aren’t above the rule’s how comes you never got banned/demodded when yoou made multiple acc’s (mod mark) For a harmless joke when it almost crashed this community?
[/quote]

Explain how it nearly crashed the community?

NO ONE lost money on members, to prove that, I made a video and cancelled the membership on my main account, I kept every day on membership, and every item in my bank.
[/quote]It nearly crashed the community because people went crazy are started saying “WHy Did I ever do this I quit” an so on.
So according to the rules you are supposed to be greatly punished.
Rule 14:
We only have 1 Forum account for Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org. If you get banned or have trouble logging in, email an admin, or get a friend to contact an admin. Multiple accounts will result in Bans.

If any of these rules have been broken, then you will be punished[/quote]

I stumbled upon a page in the admin panel, I didn’t think it would work so I tried it, gave it global mod powers to be sure. I couldn’t delete the account so I had a little fun with it. If you want to bring back the past with “this should result in ban”, I’ll happily read through all your posts and link to you breaking rules.

Read full topic

item.title: Two things
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Speakerboxxx, post:17, topic:141190”][quote author=maru link=topic=193430.msg1739596#msg1739596 date=1189260609]
Face the facts, with not one exception, other than The Un-Named, the moderation here is absolute shit.
[/quote]
What the fuck are you talking about?
The un-named is a god damn power abuser.
He expresses his anger by banning people. damn you bald fat asshole.

The only good mods here are Therealjdb and Jme_009.
They’re really doing a good job, although i suspect i might be muted because of the things i said above.[/quote]

I aint a mod, foo’

And Ima have to agree with Lothy on this one about power abuse. I know it’s often wondered how moparscape n00bs are able to get away with more shit then a contributing member can. Thing is, most of the “moparscape n00bs” post once and leave, some stick around and the elite members become their role models. You have to eradicate the problems from the root, which in this case is often the elite members. Things have been pretty lenient still. Very few higher members have been perm banned. But how is it power abuse when the rules are repeatedly broken? I mean seriously a lot of people here have flamed and spammed like no tomorrow, at most it’s a temp ban. But at the very least, mods have to show the community that they are not afraid to ban you when the rules are broken. Sometimes rules can be bent a little, that’s up to a mod to decide. Honestly I think all the mods have been more then fair. I would love to see it even stricter on everyone.

I’m very short of words today so this probably will make no sense. I used to be a pretty big noob years ago (one may say I still am :o ) when I wasn’t even aware of proper netiquette etc. I used to have little interest in computers, and even made fun of those who did. However I did get addicted to rs at one time, and eventually stumbled upon kaitnieks forums. There were many good role models I quickly adjusted myself to be more mature like them. There was no leet speak on kaitnieks, or much spam/flaming, etc. Obviously there is exceptions to that, however elite members were pretty positive people who were very very helpful. Once aryan came along, a lot of tolerance to beggingers was lost, and then pservers made it even worse. People get much more agravated now, and there’s almost a whole new sub-culture of pretending to be a moron. It’s like leet speak v2. These actions have clearly reflected onto the new members. Imo anyways.

edit: Omg I read my post. Sorry my brain is pretty scrambled today.

Read full topic

item.title: Two things

item.description:

[/quote]

The un-named is a god damn power abuser.
He expresses his anger by banning people. damn you bald fat asshole.

The only good mods here are Therealjdb and Jme_009.
They’re really doing a good job, although i suspect i might be muted because of the things i said above.[/quote]

In my opinion, there’s too many morons like you running around on the forums screaming ‘abuse!’ all the time.
Anyway, I’ve already made a decent sized post with regards to moparscape questions and posters of said questions being muted for a week or so. Mopar said that it may be fitting, but so far I haven’t seen it happening.

Read full topic

item.title: Two things
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Nohope, cry me a river.

Once again, please explain how it nearly crashed the community. It was a 15 minute joke that resulted in little kiddies lying about “OMG I HED 2 CALL MY SICK DYING AUNT TO TELL HER I HAD 2 CANCELZ HER 15 RS ACCOUNTZ” – If anyone really did cancel, then who cares. Pay back the money and continue your account + stop being so damn gullible.

I don’t have an answer about being banned for multiple accounts, other then “think about it.”

Read full topic

item.title: Two things
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

The Un-Named:

It doesn’t mean that slapping anything in a sig means it’s immune to rules, especially rule 6, however if you want, I can discuss the idea of changing rule 12 to also include “misleading text” with the other mods and admins.

ThugLife:

To be honest, i was provoking the un-named.

That’s much different. If it were a temp ban without warning for a one-time infraction, then it would be power abuse.

Read full topic

item.title: Two things
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

To be honest, i was provoking the un-named.
I was expecting the ban, when he warned me i changed the warn message to “Im a fgt - The un-named”, so he moderated me.

I put that in my sig so he banned me, i was provoking him here and on IRC, but i have been unbanned but am still keeping the moderation for a week or however long it is.

for future reference LOL.

Read full topic
